name: Mag Ruffman
biography: Mag Ruffman was born on February 28, 1957 in Richmond Hill, Ontario, Canada as Margaret Ruffman. She is an actress and director, known for  Avonlea  (1990),  Happy Christmas, Miss King  (1998) and  Deep Sea Conspiracy  (1987). She has been married to Daniel Hunter since 1989.

name: Samantha Langevin
biography: Samantha Langevin is known for her work on  Cadence  (1990),  Rock & Rule  (1983) and  Anne of Green Gables  (1985).

name: Vivian Reis
biography: Vivian Reis was born as Viviana Reyes Oñate. She is an actress, known for  Trapped in Paradise  (1994),  Avonlea  (1990) and  The Marriage Bed  (1986).

name: Jack Mather
biography: Jack Mather was born on December 8, 1915 in Mountain Park, Alberta, Canada as Jack Hallett Mather. He was an actor, known for  Billy Madison  (1995),  Anne of Green Gables  (1985) and  Silver Streak  (1976). He died on January 25, 2006 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

name: Dawn Greenhalgh
biography: Dawn Greenhalgh was born in 1934 in Shanghai, China as Hazel Dawn Greenhalgh. She is an actress, known for  The Virgin Suicides  (1999),  Maps to the Stars  (2014) and  Anne of Green Gables  (1985). She was previously married to  Ted Follows .

name: Trish Nettleton
biography: Trish Nettleton is an actress, known for  Anne of Avonlea  (1987) and  Anne of Green Gables  (1985).

name: Jennifer Inch
biography: Jennifer Inch is an actress, known for  Anne of Green Gables  (1985),  State Park  (1988) and  Anne of Avonlea  (1987).

name: Paul Brown
biography: Paul Brown is an actor, known for  Anne of Green Gables  (1985),  Critical Care  (1997) and  High Heels and Low Lifes  (2001).

name: Miranda de Pencier
biography: Miranda de Pencier was born and raised in Toronto, Canada. She studied Theatre Performance and Philosophy at Concordia University and majored in Acting at New York University. name: Cedric Smith
biography: Cedric Smith was born on September 21, 1943 in Bournemouth, England as Cedric Alan Smith. He is an actor, known for  Avonlea  (1990),  The Campbells  (1986) and  X-Men  (1992).

name: Christiane Krüger
biography: Christiane Krüger, the daughter of German movie star  Hardy Krüger , was born on September 8, 1945 in Hamburg, Germany, four months after V-E Day brought an end to the war in Europe. name: Joachim Hansen
biography: Joachim Hansen was the 'poster boy' for German movie officers in films of the 1950's and 60's. Masculine and of commanding presence, he portrayed such historical figures as Luftwaffe ace  Hans Joachim Marseille  in  Der Stern von Afrika  (1957) and Generaloberst  Alfred Jodl  in  The Winds of War  (1983) and  War and Remembrance  (1988). name: Rosemary Radcliffe
biography: Rosemary Radcliffe is an actress, known for  Anne of Green Gables  (1985),  Married Life  (1995) and  Anne of Green Gables: The Continuing Story  (2000).

name: Jonathan Crombie
biography: Jonathan Crombie  was born on Wednesday, October 12th, 1966, in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He was the baby of the family (he had two older sisters). His parents are David and Shirley Ann. name: Charmion King
biography: Charmion King was born on July 25, 1925 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. She was an actress, known for  Anne of Green Gables  (1985),  Last Night  (1998) and  Anne of Avonlea  (1987). She was married to  Gordon Pinsent . She died on January 6, 2007 in Toronto.

name: Schuyler Grant
biography: Schuyler Grant was delivered by her dad in Los Gatos, California, on April 29, 1971. She graduated from her high school in Sebastopol, California, with a class size of around 300. name: Jackie Burroughs
biography: Jackie Burroughs was born February 2, 1939 in Lancashire, England, UK. She acted in live theater at Ontario's Stratford Festival before she made her film debut appearance in  The Ernie Game  (1967), she went on to act in several other films which include  The Grey Fox  (1982) a performance that earned her a Genie, and  The Dead Zone  (1983). name: Richard Farnsworth
biography: An American stuntman who, after more than 30 years in the business, moved into acting and became an acclaimed and respected character actor, Richard Farnsworth was a native of Los Angeles. name: Patricia Hamilton
biography: Patricia Hamilton was born in 1938 in Canada. She is known for her work on  Avonlea  (1990),  My Bloody Valentine  (1981) and  Anne of Green Gables  (1985).

name: Marilyn Lightstone
biography: Marilyn Lightstone was born on June 28, 1940 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress and writer, known for  Heavy Metal  (1981),  In Praise of Older Women  (1978) and  Avonlea  (1990).

name: Colleen Dewhurst
biography: Tall, luminous and leonine, the legendary Colleen Dewhurst must go down as one of the theater's finest contemporary tragediennes of the late 1900s. name: Jayne Eastwood
biography: Jayne Eastwood was born on December 17, 1946 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. She is an actress, known for  Dawn of the Dead  (2004),  My Big Fat Greek Wedding  (2002) and  Videodrome  (1983). She is married to  David Flaherty . They have three children.
